resources.string: Where the annual salary income does not exceed PKR. 600,000 then the rate of the income tax is 0%
Where the annual salary income exceeds PKR. 600,000 but does not exceed PKR. 1,200,000 then the rate of income tax is 2.5% of the amount exceeding PKR. 600,000.
Where the annual salary income exceeds PKR. 1,200,000 but does not exceed PKR. 2,400,000 then the rate of income tax is PKR.15000 + 12.5% of the amount exceeding PKR. 1,200,000.
Where the annual salary income exceeds PKR. 2,400,000 but does not exceed PKR. 3,600,000 then the rate of income tax is PKR. 165,000 + 22.5% of the amount exceeding PKR. 2,400,000.
Where the annual salary income exceeds PKR. 3,600,000 but does not exceed PKR. 6,000,000 then the rate of income tax is PKR. 435,000 + 27.5% of the amount exceeding PKR. 3,600,000.
Where the annual salary income exceeds PKR. 6,000,000 then the rate of income tax is PKR. 1,095,000 + 35% of the amount exceeding PKR. 6,000,000.
